channel.title: Mysql error?
channel.description:
im trying to add vote4auth website wise is fully working 100% but it seems like the server sided it refusing the MySQL connection when I try to claim my auth key?
[CODE][6/7/13 12:26 PM]: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.Communication***ception: Comm unications link failure

item.title: Mysql error?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

ugot the drivers right?

item.title: Mysql error?
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Are you sure you’re using the correct username and password?

item.title: Mysql error?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

000webhost allows it. try them.

or just get a free sql database at db4free.net

Read full topic

item.title: Mysql error?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:6, topic:520984”]connection refused.

check the host/user/pass[/quote]
This is what I was trying to figure out.
If you are using free x10Hosting. They don’t allow Remote SQL.

Read full topic

item.title: Mysql error?
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

Make sure you add your IP to the Remote MySQL to allow the server to connect to your database.

Read full topic
